content: rarepepi: Made significant code changes across 535 files (+87,715/-8,374 lines) with a primary focus on configuration work (45% of changes). Merged two Docker-related bug fixes: PR #1139 removing an unnecessary Docker compose command and PR #796 fixing non-interactive mode for Cloud instances. Currently has two open PRs (#1137 and #1106) awaiting review. Active on 8 days this month with an occasional contribution pattern.
